channel.title: System requirements
channel.description: Hello, I'm new here what up. Can a AMD r5 series graphic card run black mesa at full settings with an 8gb ram memory full speed with an AMD A9-9420

item.title: System requirements
item.dc:creator: RedEye9
item.description:
You can purchase the game on Steam and refund it if it doesn’t work.
But like CPU said, discrete gpu’s are not supported.

Read full topic

item.title: System requirements

item.description:
How about a r7 apu? An AMD a8 quad core computer?

Read full topic

item.title: System requirements
item.dc:creator: CPU
item.description:
Your system doesn’t meet the minimum requirements.
Specifically, you need a Dedicated video card with at least 2GB of memory installed on it.
You can try running the game on lowest settings.

Read full topic
